data.name: Pass the Coin Game
data.description:
There are ***N*** kids who came up with a new game. They all sit around a circular table and each of them has **1** coin. The rule of the game is that the *first* kid passes **1** coin to the *second* kid, then the *second* kid passes **2** coins to the *third* kid. The *third* kid then passes **1** coin to the *fourth* and so on (i.e. each of them passes **1** or **2** coins alternately). Every time a kid has no more coins left, he/she gets eliminated. The kid who gets all the coins wins the game.

Given an integer ***N***, where ***1 < N < 2<sup>20</sup>***, return `true` if the game will ever end. The game ends if there is only one kid left. Otherwise, return `false`.
### Example
N | Output
-- | --
3 | true
4 | true
38 | false
19 | false
16 | false
